enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve generating lists of text elements (sentences in sentences() and paragraphs in paragraphs()).
paragraph(int) is used within paragraphs(int) to generate individual paragraphs, making it a direct dependency.
The output of paragraph(int) is used to construct the list of paragraphs in paragraphs(int), making it a direct source for assertions.
sentence(int, int) is used within paragraph(int), which in turn is used in paragraphs(int), making it a relevant method for assertions.
